definition: A unit of measurement used to quantify the dimensions of an object, typically employed for determining the size or length of an item. It is often utilized in the context of customs and border control to assess import and export duties on goods.

examples.english: The inch is equal to 2.54 centimeters.

examples.german: Ich muss meine Waren beim Zoll anmelden.
examples.english: I have to declare my goods at customs.
The customs officer checked my passport.

examples.german: Die Zollgebühren für dieses Produkt sind hoch.
examples.english: The customs duties for this product are high.

examples.german: Der Zoll hat das Paket geöffnet und überprüft.
examples.english: Customs opened and inspected the package.
